job_description:
• Hands-on experience in either electrical engineeringBasic CAD skills (SolidWorks, Onshape, etc.
• )Comfortable doing physical work - setup, assembly, post-processingAble to work on-site in Palo AltoCurrently studying engineering or a related field.

• Make a real impact by developing innovative products and solutions to meet our global customers' evolving needs and help make people’s lives easier, safe and secure.
• Bachelor’s with up to 2 years experience or a recent Master’s degree with no work experience in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science, or related field.
• Experience with Python, MATLAB, or similar tools.
• Experience with embedded development environments.
• Strong communication and teamwork skills.
• Launch and advance your career in technical and business roles across four Product Groups and various corporate functions.
• You will have the opportunities to explore our hardware and software capabilities and try new things.
• Maximize your performance and wellbeing in our flexible and inclusive work environment.

• Own assignments from proof-of-concept to design, and code delivery to MLOpsProduct Understanding: Understand our products from both the customer perspective and the engineering perspectiveAI Advocacy: Actively advocate for improving AI best practices, both internally in the tools and services offered by the AI team, as well as externally in the way the product teams integrate against those services Building robust pipelines for ingesting and processing both structured and unstructured data from diverse life sciences sourcesDeveloping and implementing transparent and explainable AI systems that maintain scientific accuracy while delivering insights that medical professionals can trust and act uponCreating domain-specific AI solutions that can navigate the complexity of medical and scientific language with high precisionBalancing the power of cutting-edge AI with the need for regulatory compliance and scientific rigor in healthcare applications 3+ years of enterprise SaaS software development experience3+ years of Python experience3+ years of experience with cloud computing (GCP preferred)Experience with Large Language ModelsExperience with common Data Science tooling and packagesA positive and collaborative attitudeInitiative and self-motivationMotivation and drive to continuously improve and learn by trying new tools, processes, or methodologiesExcellent verbal and written communication skillsCompany-provided laptop and hardware Ability to develop accurate, scalable, and explainable AI solutions that directly address customer needsReduction in processing time for complex scientific datasets while maintaining or improving accuracyQuality of integration between AI systems and product features as measured by customer satisfactionContributions to our AI toolkit that enable other teams to build more efficientlyDemonstrated ability to balance innovation with production stability in deployed AI systems Pursuit of excellence and mastery of their craftHumility in defeat and in successKindness and empathy towards othersDesire to create large-scale, positive change.
• Explainable AI Development: Build AI systems with transparency and explainability at their core, allowing users to understand how and why specific conclusions are reached—critical for life sciences applications where trustworthiness is paramountModel Development & Refinement: Collaborate with the AI and MLOps teams to build and prototype new solutions for our customers, as well as our enterprise SaaS product offeringsCross-Functional Collaboration: Work with product and delivery teams to assist with the design and development of AI-powered features in our productsModel Creation & Training: Create, train and test models that deliver our AI capabilities with a focus on scientific accuracy and domain relevanceModel Optimization: Fine-tune, optimize and ground models to ensure they are sound and fit for purpose.
